Score_ID: ~[tlist_sql;SELECT score.ID
scrs.SCHOOLCOURSETITLE
tch.LASTNAME AS TEACHERLASTNAME
asmt.ID
score.SCORE
stu.FIRSTNAME
FROM PSM_ASSIGNMENTSCORE score
INNER JOIN PSM_SECTIONASSIGNMENT sa ON sa.ID=score.SECTIONASSIGNMENTID
INNER JOIN PSM_ASSIGNMENT asmt on asmt.ID=sa.ASSIGNMENTID
INNER JOIN PSM_SECTION sec ON sec.ID=sa.SECTIONID
INNER JOIN PSM_SCHOOLCOURSE scrs ON scrs.ID=sec.SCHOOLCOURSEID
INNER JOIN PSM_TERM strm ON strm.ID=sec.TERMID
INNER JOIN PSM_REPORTINGTERM rtrm ON rtrm.TERMID=sec.TERMID AND rtrm.STARTDATE<=sa.DATEASSIGNMENTDUE AND rtrm.ENDDATE>=sa.DATEASSIGNMENTDUE
INNER JOIN PSM_SECTIONENROLLMENT se ON se.SECTIONID=sec.ID AND se.ID=score.SECTIONENROLLMENTID
INNER JOIN PSM_SECTIONTEACHER stch ON stch.SECTIONID=sec.ID
INNER JOIN PSM_TEACHER tch ON tch.ID=stch.TEACHERID
INNER JOIN PSM_STUDENT stu ON stu.ID=se.STUDENTID
INNER JOIN STUDENTS pstu ON pstu.STUDENT_NUMBER=stu.STUDENTIDENTIFIER
WHERE strm.SCHOOLYEAR=2015 AND scrs.COURSECODE='8600'
AND asmt.NAME LIKE 'Final-Final (Short Story Essay)'
ORDER BY scrs.COURSECODE
[/tlist_sql]
